01:13:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>ae9299761b66b45092ce8514604bcbf9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-16 01:38:44</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
 /*
    var import_GR = new GlideRecord('scheduled_import_set');
	import_GR.addQuery('Name','WS1UEMImportSchedule');
	import_GR.query();
	if(import_GR.next()){
      	gs.executeNow(import_GR);
    }
*/

  // run data source
    var import_GR = new GlideRecord('sys_data_source');
	import_GR.addQuery('Name','VMware Workspace ONE ITSM Connector');
	import_GR.query();
	if(import_GR.next()){
      	gs.executeNow(import_GR);
      
      	// carry out transform
        var transform_GR = new GlideRecord('sys_robust_import_set_transformer');
		transform_GR.addQuery('Name','VMware Workspace ONE ITSM Connector');
		transform_GR.query();
		if(transform_GR.next()){
      		gs.executeNow(transform_GR);
        }
    }
  
})(inputs, outputs);
</value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_hub_step_instance</document><document_key>6a9299761b66b45092ce8514604bcbe6</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-16 01:13:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>ea9299761b66b45092ce8514604bcbf9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-16 01:13:04</sys_updated_on><value/><variable display_value="Select MID Server">2c226939b3101300176b051a16a8dc83</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
